main.title: Welcome
main.projectDescription: A light-weight version of Postman and GrqphiQL combined in one app.
main.courseDescription: The Rolling Scopes brings together developers of all levels who are passionate about technologies such as JavaScript, Front-end development, AWS, and more. Currently, many developers around the world recognize The Rolling Scopes for its community-based education program, along with fascinating events and its groovy mascot, Sloth.

password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.digit: Password must contain at least one digit
password.special: Password must contain at least one special character
password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

user.onlyLatin: Name must contain only Latin letters
user.startUppercase: Name must start with an uppercase Latin letter
